resource.name: Planning Applications/Approvals - Last 5 Years
resource.description:
Data set of all Planning Applications submitted to or Approved by the City of Orlando in the last 5 years (rolling), or that were updated in the last 5 years.  

Disclaimer: This data is derived from the Economic Development Platform, we acknowledge there is always the possibility of mechanical or human error. The City of Orlando does not guarantee the accuracy of the information. The City of Orlando will not be responsible for any error or omission, or for the use of, or the results obtained from the use of this information. All data visualizations on maps should be considered approximate and attempts to derive specific addresses are strictly prohibited. Additionally, because City policy and operations regarding reporting might change, the data may have limited value for comparisons over time.
columns_description: Neighborhood of the project location (if applicable)
Project Address
GPSX
Name of the primary applicant on the Planning application
Name of the Project on the Planning Application.  Depending on the application type, the project name may be the address of the project.
Date of application approval
Date the Planning Application was processed by the City of Orlando
City of Orlando Commissioner District
Mainstreet District of the project location (if applicable)
Parcel ID of the Project Address
GPSY
Comments included on the Planning application to provide additional detail
Application case number assigned to the Planning project
Application Type Description - see attachment "City of Orlando Planning Application Types" under About this Dataset for complete listing.
Status of the Application as of the last run date
City of Orlando Commissioner Name
Community Redevelopment Area for the project location (if applicable)

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Commissioner Districts' (bgqw-styj) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Neighborhoods' (gsfg-ku74) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Main Street Program Area' (u8wz-9eai) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: USE Permit Applications - Right of Way, Sidewalk Cafe
resource.description: All Use permit applications processed by the City of Orlando in the last 5 years (rolling).  Includes Right of Way (ROW) and Sidewalk Cafe (SWC) permit applications.
columns_description: Run Date of this dataset
Commissioner District where the project is located
Community Redevelopment Area (if applicable)
The type of Use permit application: ROW = Right of Way, SWC = Sidewalk Cafe
Name of the Commissioner for the district where the project is located
# of Transportation Engineering Reviews for this Use permit application as of the last run date
Capacity or role of the Primary applicant on the Use permit application
Status of the Use permit application as of last run date.  Possible values include: Open, Closed, Finaled, Hold, Hardhold, Stop Work
Work Type detail of the Use permit application
Expiration date of the Use permit application
Milestone of the the Use permit application as of last run date
The Service Provider applicant of the Use permit application
# of Traffic Control Reviews for this Use permit application as of the last run date
The Mainstreet District of the project (if applicable)
The Neighborhood of the project (if applicable)
# of Planning Reviews for this Use permit application as of the last run date
The Use permit application case number
The address of the project.  May be missing/blank - use Location or Comments as alternative source
Date the Use permit application was finalized
The Project Dox applicant of the Use permit application
GPSY
Name of the Project on the Use permit application
Street where the project is located.  May be missing/blank, use Location or Comments as alternative source
The Company applicant of the Use permit application.
The Owner applicant of the Use permit application
# of Site Reviews for this Use permit application as of the last run date
Location listed on the Use permit application - may be used to supplement missing address detail
Parcel ID
GPSX
Name of the Primary applicant
Company of the Primary Contact (if applicable)
Phone # of the Primary contact (if provided)
Date the Use permit application was processed
Date the Use permit application was issued
The Contractor applicant of the Use permit application
Development of Regional Impact (if applicable)
Contact type of the Primary applicant on the Use permit application
Email address of the Primary contact (if provided)
Additional Comments captured on the Use permit application
